word[0]: at/in the back of your mind
definition[0]: a thought that is at the back of your mind is one you try to ignore because you do not want it to be true
example[0]: At the back of her mind was the thought that he might be with someone else.
example[1]: He tried to push these uncomfortable thoughts to the back of his mind.
note[0]: put/push something to the back of your mind
